</ul>        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12">
            <ul id="menu-lazer-1" class="category-lazer"><li class="title"><a href="http://www.tempoagora.com.br/bem-melhor-saber/lazer/">Lazer</a></li><li class="menu-item menu-item-type-taxonomy menu-item-object-category menu-item-112"><a href="http://www.tempoagora.com.br/bem-melhor-saber/lazer/cultura/">Cultura</a></li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
     </div>

	<p>Deseja saber sobre o tempo em outro lugar? <strong>Experimente!</strong></p>

	<div id="main" class="site-main space-top">
<section role="forecast" class="pais">
	<div class="container">
        				<div class="row">
			<div class="col-md-7">
				<div class="block-1">
					<div class="clearfix page-title title-previ-mobile">
						<h1>Previsão do tempo</h1>
					</div>
					<h2>Brasil</h2>
					<div class="custom-scrollbar">
						<p>
                            Nesta sessão, a Somar Meteorologia deixa você bem informado com a previsão diária para todo o país. Aqui você confere como o tempo vai se comportar no decorrer do dia e assim, você pode se planejar ao longo da semana. <br/><br/>
                            O Brasil é um país de dimensões continentais e, por conta da sua grande extensão e variedade de relevo, vegetação e posicionamento geográfico, possui climas diversos. Isso se reflete em grandes contrastes nas condições do tempo por aqui. <br/><br/>
                            Você sabia que a menor temperatura do Brasil já registrada foi observada em Santa Catarina, na cidade de Caçador com -14ºC, em 1952. Já a maior temperatura (registrada no período da tarde) foi em Bom Jesus-PI com 44,7ºC em 2005. <br/><br/>
                            Em relação à chuva, o menor volume acumulado anual geralmente é registrado no sertão nordestino, onde a média fica na faixa dos 400mm. Já o maior volume de chuva acontece na Ilha de Marajó, no Pará, onde o acumulado fica na faixa dos 3.000mm anuais. <br/><br/>
                            Os fenômenos adversos mais comuns no Brasil são as cheias, a queda de raios e de granizo, as estiagens e até mesmo a ocorrência de tornados. Já os fenômenos meteorológicos adversos que não vemos por aqui ou que a frequência é muito baixa são os furacões, terremotos, maremotos e atividade vulcânica. 
						</p>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="forecast-image mapa-brasil">
					<img class="heat_spots" src="http://www.tempoagora.com.br/imagens/mancha/BR_max_hoje.png"/>
					<img class="heat_map" src="http://www.tempoagora.com.br/wp-content/themes/tempo_agora/images/mapa_previsao_brasil.png">
					<img class="line_map" src="http://www.tempoagora.com.br/wp-content/themes/tempo_agora/images/mapa_linhas_brasil.png">
					<img class="legend" src="http://www.tempoagora.com.br/wp-content/themes/tempo_agora/images/legend-heat.png">
					<div class="source"><strong>fonte: </strong>tempo agora</div>

<!-- Criteo StickyBanner 25/02/2015 -->
<style media="screen" type="text/css">
#ctoclose{display:block;width:9px;height:10px;background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,);background-repeat:no-repeat!important;border-bottom-color:#6d6c71;cursor:pointer}#ctoclosebg{padding:7px;cursor:pointer;float:right}#ctowrapper{position:fixed;opacity:0;line-height:0!important;z-index:2147483646!important;text-align:center!important;zoom:1}.ctounselectable{-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;-o-user-select:none;user-select:none}#ctopanel{display:inline-block;width:100%}#ctoclose:hover{opacity:.7}#ctobannerwrapper{display:inline-block!important;position:relative!important;vertical-align:middle}#ctomessage{display:none;background-color:#fff;border-style: solid;border-width: 1px 0 0 0;cursor:pointer;line-height: 21px;padding:0px 20px;font-size:12px;font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;float:right;}</style><div id="ctowrapper"><div id="ctopanel"><span class="ctounselectable" id="ctomessage"></span><div id="ctoclosebg"><a id="ctoclose" class="ctounselectable close"></a></div></div><div id="ctoinnerwrapper"><div id="ctobannerwrapper" class="ctounselectable">
<script type="text/javascript">

/*-------------------------Criteo StickyBanner options-------------------------*/
var zoneid_desktop = "227701";
var zoneid_mobile  = "227702";

// The limit values are used to detect a mobile.
// This script will use the mobile zone id if the user's window width is inferior to "limit_width px" or if the user's windows height is inferior "limit_height px". Otherwise, it will use the desktop zone id.
var limit_width  = 700;
var limit_height = 200;

// Overlay color and opacity
var overlay_color = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09)";

// Closing area
var close_message = "Fechar";
var closing_color = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)";

// Animation
var animationTime = 300;


/*-------------------------Criteo StickyBanner code-------------------------*/
var zoneid_selected = zoneid_desktop;
if( window.innerWidth<window.limit_width || window.innerHeight<window.limit_height) {
	zoneid_selected = zoneid_mobile;
}
<!--//<![CDATA[
document.MAX_ct0 ='INSERT MACRO HERE';
var m3_u=location.protocol=="https:"?"https://cas.criteo.com/delivery/ajs.php?":"http://cas.criteo.com/delivery/ajs.php?";var m3_r=Math.floor(Math.random()*99999999999);document.write("<scr"+"ipt type='text/javascript' src='"+m3_u);document.write("zoneid="+zoneid_selected);document.write("&nodis=1");document.write("&cb="+m3_r);if(document.MAX_used!=",")document.write("&exclude="+document.MAX_used);document.write(document.charset?"&charset="+document.charset:document.characterSet?"&charset="+document.characterSet:"");document.write("&loc="+escape(window.location));if(document.referrer)document.write("&referer="+escape(document.referrer));if(document.context)document.write("&context="+escape(document.context));if(typeof document.MAX_ct0!="undefined"&&document.MAX_ct0.substring(0,4)=="http"){document.write("&ct0="+escape(document.MAX_ct0))}if(document.mmm_fo)document.write("&mmm_fo=1");document.write("'></scr"+"ipt>")
//]]>-->
</script></div></div></div><script type="text/javascript">function setInOutAnimation(t){t.style.setProperty("-webkit-transition","all "+window.animationTime+"ms cubic-bezier(0.455, 0.030, 0.515,     filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#00FFFFFF', endColorstr='#193341FF'); /* IE8-9 */
  }

  .icon-btn.disabled,
  .icon-btn.disabled:hover,
  .icon-btn[disabled],
  .icon-btn[aria-disabled=true] {
    color: #3341FF;
  }

  /* tweet-btn can have primary-btn class as well so the following rules ensure that the correct background color is applied */
  .tweet-btn,
  .tweet-btn:focus {
    background-color: #3341FF;
    background: rgba(51,65,255,.8);
  }

  .tweet-btn:hover,
  .tweet-btn:active,
  .tweet-btn.active {
    background-color: #3341FF;
  }

  .tweet-btn.btn.disabled,
  .tweet-btn.btn.disabled:hover,
  .tweet-btn.btn[disabled],
  .tweet-btn.btn[aria-disabled=true] {
    background: #3341FF;
  }

  .btn:focus,
  .btn.focus,
  .Button:focus,
  .EmojiPicker-item.is-focused {
    box-shadow:
      0 0 0 1px #fff,
      0 0 0 3px rgba(51, 65, 255, 0.5);
  }

  .selected-stream-item:focus {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(51, 65, 255, 0.5);
  }

  /* highlighting when navigate through timeline stream table view with j & k. */
  .js-navigable-stream.stream-table-view .selected-stream-item[tabindex="-1"]:focus {
    outline: 3px solid rgba(51, 65, 255, 0.5) !important;
  }

  /* box-shadow does not work with table tr element */
  .js-navigable-stream.stream-table-view .selected-stream-item:focus {
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  /**
   * 1. Bring actionable tweet to top when active to ensure border
   *    highlighting wraps entire tweet. Value must be at least at if not
   *    higher than the z-index value of ProfileHeading to ensure first
   *    tweet in timeline receives border on all four sides.
   *    NOTE: z-index should be 2 to avoid conflicts with .ProfileCanopy and .ProfileCard-avatarLink
   */

  .js-stream-item.is-selected:focus .ProfileCard,
  .QuoteTweet:hover,
  .QuoteTweet:focus,
  .QuoteTweet:active {
    border-color: rgba(51, 65, 255, 0.5);
    z-index: 2; /* 1 */
  }

  .global-dm-nav.new.with-count .dm-new {
    background: #fff;
  }

  .global-dm-nav.new.with-count .dm-new .count-inner {
    background: #3341FF;
  }

  .global-nav .people .count .count-inner {
    background: #3341FF;
  }

  .dropdown-menu li > a:hover,
  .dropdown-menu li > a:focus,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link:hover,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link:focus,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link.is-focused,
  .dropdown-menu li:hover .dropdown-link,
  .dropdown-menu li:focus .dropdown-link,
  .dropdown-menu .typeahead-recent-search-item.selected,
  .dropdown-menu .typeahead-saved-search-item.selected,
  .dropdown-menu .selected a,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link.selected {
    background-color: #3341FF !important;
  }

/* give tweet boxes 10% of the users link color as background */
.home-tweet-box,
.LiveVideo-tweetBox,
.RetweetDialog-commentBox,
.WebToast-box--altColor {
  background-color: #EAECFF;
}

  color: #3341FF;
}
/* give tweet box containers an outline using the users link color */
.RichEditor,
.TweetBoxAttachments {
  border-color: #CCCFFF;
}

input:focus,
textarea:focus,
div[contenteditable="true"]:focus,
div[contenteditable="true"].fake-focus,
div[contenteditable="plaintext-only"]:focus,
div[contenteditable="plaintext-only"].fake-focus {
  border-color: #848DFF;

}

.tweet-box textarea:focus,
.tweet-box input[type=text],
.currently-dragging .tweet-form.is-droppable .tweet-drag-help,

  border-color: #ADB3FF;
  box-shadow: none;
}

  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(51, 65, 255, 0.5);
}

  <ul>
    <li class="geo-not-enabled-yet">
      <h2>Add a location to your Tweets</h2>
      <p>
        When you tweet with a location, Twitter stores that location.&#32;
        You can switch location on/off before each Tweet and always have the option to delete your location history.
        <a href="http://support.twitter.com/forums/26810/entries/78525" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a>
      </p>
      <div>
        <button type="button" class="geo-turn-on btn primary-btn">Turn location on</button>
        <button type="button" class="geo-not-now btn-link">Not now</button>
      </div>
    </li>
  </ul>
</div>

Premios Internacionales de Periodismo Rey de España.
